page.title: 05SOUTHPORT ZOO
page.content: Southport Zoo is run by one family - the Petrie family.Doug and Carole Petrie set up the zoo in 1964.They had about 20 animals.They tried to make the animals feel as much at home as they could because most of the animals come from places abroad with different climates.The animals which breed most at Southport Zoo are the chimpanzees and the Mandrill Baboons. The zoo has landscaped gardens with good animal enclosures.Some animals that the zoo keeps are lions, lynx, leopards,bears, otters, owls and various types of monkeys, small mammals,penguins, flamingoes and tropical fish.
